name: FireGard® Wetted ATO
description: FireGard® Wetted ATO is a powerful flame retardant additive that combines Antimony Trioxide with 2% DIDP. This liquid-form industrial additive, designed to enhance fire resistance, serves as an effective flame retardant. Its applications include chemicals production, making it an essential choice for fire safety enhancement. FireGard® Wetted ATO is part of the industrial additives category and is available in convenient drum packaging. It is particularly suitable for various processes within chemicals production, offering advanced fire protection.
